resolveAPIKey.name: Resolve API Key
resolveAPIKey.description: Automatically tries to resolve your API Key

apiKey.name: API Key
apiKey.description: The TeamSpeak API Key can be found by following these steps: Open TeamSpeak -> Click on Tools -> Options -> Addons -> My Addons -> Search for the "ClientQuery" Addon -> Click on Settings and copy the API Key from the text field.

teamSpeak.name: TeamSpeak
teamSpeak.invalidKey: TeamSpeak denied the connection. Please manually supply the API key in the TeamSpeak Addon settings.
teamSpeak.invalidKeyManual: TeamSpeak denied the connection. Please make sure the API key is correct.
teamSpeak.noSelectedServer: You are not connected to a server.
teamSpeak.noSelectedChannel: You are not connected to a channel.

prettyChannelName.name: Pretty Channel Name
prettyChannelName.description: Removes the [lspacer], [rspacer], [cspacer] & [*spacer] prefix from channel names
